org.apache.cxf.interceptor
Interface InterceptorChain

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Interceptor<? extends Message>>
All Known Implementing Classes:
PhaseInterceptorChain
public interface InterceptorChain
extends java.lang.Iterable<Interceptor<? extends Message>>

Base interface for all interceptor chains. An interceptor chain is an ordered list of interceptors associated with one portion of the web service processing pipeline. Interceptor chains are defined for either the SOAP client's request or response handling, the web service's, or error handling interceptor chains for SOAP faults.
